hindi:
बुरा जो देखन मैं चला, बुरा न मिलिया कोय।
जो मन खोजा आपना, तो मुझसे बुरा न कोय।
english:
Bura jo dekhan main chala, bura na miliya koy.
Jo man khoja aapna, to mujhse bura na koy.
translation:
I went looking for bad people, but found none.
When I searched within myself, I found that I was the worst of all.
